short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All-in-one social media scraper that automate your growth marketing workflows, including Facebook, LinkedIn, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the power of data extraction across various social media platforms with our versatile tool. Extract valuable information from Facebook group members, LinkedIn group members, LinkedIn search results, and much more. Discover verified professional email addresses, designations, locations, company names, and domains, plus a wealth of other data points.

Enhance your outreach strategies and growth marketing tactics by leveraging the extracted data. Build custom Facebook audiences for targeted ad campaigns or initiate outreach through email or messages from extracted audience information. All data can be conveniently downloaded in CSV format.
